      <pubDate>Tue, 24 Jan 2023 18:10:49 +0000</pubDate>
      <description>&lt;p&gt;Now shipping v8 of our eleventy-base-blog starter ‚ö°Ô∏è&lt;/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;üéà Using Eleventy v2&lt;br /&gt;‚úçüèª Support for draft posts&lt;br /&gt;üñº Image optimization (including img/picture swap, new formats like AVIF)&lt;br /&gt;üöÑ Performance focused: 0 CLS, 0ms TBT&lt;br /&gt;üë©‚Äçüç≥ Content-driven navigation menu&lt;br /&gt;üì∏ Zero-client JS syntax highlighting&lt;br /&gt;üçº Atom/JSON feeds&lt;/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;Read more: &lt;a href="https://www.11ty.dev/blog/bbv8/" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer"&gt;&lt;span class="invisible"&gt;https://www.&lt;/span&gt;&lt;span class=""&gt;11ty.dev/blog/bbv8/&lt;/span&gt;&lt;span class="invisible"&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;Check out an updated Lighthouse report for the latest build: &lt;a href="https://eleventy-base-blog.netlify.app/reports/lighthouse/" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer"&gt;&lt;span class="invisible"&gt;https://&lt;/span&gt;&lt;span class="ellipsis"&gt;eleventy-base-blog.netlify.app&lt;/span&gt;&lt;span class="invisible"&gt;/reports/lighthouse/&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/p&gt;</description>

      <description>&lt;p&gt;üéàüêÄ‚ö°Ô∏è We are delighted to announce the very first beta release of Eleventy v2.0!&lt;/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;a href="https://www.11ty.dev/blog/eleventy-v2-beta/" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer"&gt;&lt;span class="invisible"&gt;https://www.&lt;/span&gt;&lt;span class="ellipsis"&gt;11ty.dev/blog/eleventy-v2-beta&lt;/span&gt;&lt;span class="invisible"&gt;/&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;ü™¢ Dependencies decreased by 32.1%&lt;br /&gt;üî¨ `node_modules` size decreased by 77.8%&lt;br /&gt;üöÑ 30.5% faster npm install&lt;br /&gt;üè† Incremental Builds&lt;br /&gt;üíª New Dev Server with DOM-diffing live reload&lt;br /&gt;üîå Plugins for Edge rendering, i18n, Vite&lt;br /&gt;üõ† Support for WebC&lt;/p&gt;</description>

      <pubDate>Tue, 17 Jan 2023 15:19:49 +0000</pubDate>
      <description>&lt;p&gt;After listening to a bunch of feedback from folks and reconsidering the experience of folks trying out Eleventy for the first time, we‚Äôre going to swap back to the previous default for passthrough file copy behavior in in Eleventy 2.0.&lt;/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;Read more: &lt;a href="https://www.11ty.dev/docs/copy/?#emulate-passthrough-copy-during-serve" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer"&gt;&lt;span class="invisible"&gt;https://www.&lt;/span&gt;&lt;span class="ellipsis"&gt;11ty.dev/docs/copy/?#emulate-p&lt;/span&gt;&lt;span class="invisible"&gt;assthrough-copy-during-serve&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;This feature is now opt-in, rather than opt-out!&lt;/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;Thanks y‚Äôall!&lt;/p&gt;</description>
      <category>emulate</category>

      <guid isPermaLink="true">https://fosstodon.org/@eleventy/109684372031836480</guid>
      <link>https://fosstodon.org/@eleventy/109684372031836480</link>
      <pubDate>Fri, 13 Jan 2023 22:58:16 +0000</pubDate>
